video.title: Ancient Black Ops
video.synopsis: Elite troops are not a new concept in warfare: Even the rulers of antiquity employed highly skilled assassins to carry out their political will.

episodes.synopsis: The word "assassin" stems from 11th century Shiites who were so skilled at killing Sunnis that their enemies accused them of being high on hashish.
episodes.title: The Assassins

episodes.synopsis: With Greece buckling under the weight of Persian invaders, the Spartan 300 employ their ultra-elite Krypteia in a last-ditch assassination attempt.
episodes.title: The Spartans

episodes.synopsis: The legendary Jewish dagger-assassins known as the Sicarii were feared by their Roman occupiers and skilled at silently blending into a crowd.
episodes.title: The Sicarii

episodes.synopsis: The fearsome Harii were a squad of German "ghost warriors" and independent night-raiders who inflicted one of the Roman army's worst defeats.
episodes.title: The Ghost Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Said to have no fear of death, Viking berserkers may have used hallucinogenic mushrooms to fuel their ruthless, pagan battle tactics.
episodes.title: The Viking Berserkers

episodes.synopsis: The ax-wielding Varangian Guard were Viking soldiers of fortune who made their way across the Byzantine Empire and conquered Sicily.
episodes.title: The Varangian Guard

episodes.synopsis: The Aztec Empire's widely feared Eagle Warriors pressed their skills in a bloody clash of cultures when a new kind of enemy came to Tenochtitlan.
episodes.title: Aztec Eagle Warriors

episodes.synopsis: In 1779, Captain James Cook lands on Hawaii and makes the fatal mistake of underestimating the fighting skills of the islands' elite Koa warriors.
episodes.title: Hawaiian Koa Warriors

episodes.synopsis: When Hattori Hanzo's ninja warriors conduct a rescue operation that angers a cruel overlord, they know they must kill him or suffer the consequences.
episodes.title: Ninja

episodes.synopsis: To avenge the death of their master, disgraced Samurai known as the 47 ronin attack the capital of Japan with the perfect black op.
episodes.title: The 47 Ronin
